00192 #define V1290_IS_GLOBAL_TRAILER(data)           ((data& V1290_DATA_TYPE_MASK)== V1290_GLOBAL_TRAILER)

00197 #define V1290_IS_GLOBAL_TRIGGER_TIME(data)      ((data& V1290_DATA_TYPE_MASK)== V1290_GLOBAL_TRIGGER_TIME)      
00198 #define V1290_IS_FILLER(data)                           ((data& V1290_DATA_TYPE_MASK)== V1290_FILLER)

00231 // TDC edge and resolution settings
00232 // only 2 lsb bits matter (see 5.4 @ manual)
00233 // edge code: 00-pair mode, 01-only trailing, 10-only leading, 11-both edges
00234 // resolution code (for edges): 00-800 ps, 01-200 ps, 10-100 ps, 11-25 ns
